title: By selling 120 mangoes, a person gains a profit equal to CP of 20 mangoes. What is the profit percent? - Quora

response.answer_text: If cost per mango is Rs 1 then total cost=120×1=Rs 120, and profit =20×1 = Rs 20 %of profit = (20/120) ×100 =16.66%

Let x be cp of each mango and y be sp of each mango Sp of 120 mangoes=120y Cp of 120 mangoes=120x Cp of 20 mangoes=20x Now on 120x cp we get profit 20x Then100 cp. We get 20x*100/120x= 2000/120 =16.66
